title: Ranked Demotion?
body: I was at 7 lp and i lost a game then got demoted? I could understand if i had been at 0, but what?

replies.body: When you lost that first game, it dropped you down to 7 LP. After that you played and lost another game which dropped you to 0, then the next lost game demoted you to B3 with 75 LP.
Why did I even get demoted from 0 that game then I mean I have highish mmr and I have lost at 0 lp and not been demoted before?
